items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 8/10/2025 - Minor flush yesterday, was that all?
bullets: Minor flush tested support at $28,000; held above key level.
Resistance at $30,000 remains intact; watch for momentum shifts.
Invalidation below $27,500 could signal further downside.

items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 7/10/2025 - We need a last minute pump... or more dump coming!
bullets: Current support at $30,000; resistance at $32,500.
Recent price action shows a potential bearish divergence; watch for momentum shifts.
Invalidation level set at $29,500; a close below may indicate further downside.

items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 6/10/2025 - Rotation Please....
bullets: BTC holds support at $30,000, resistance at $32,500.
ETH shows momentum shift above $2,000, with key support at $1,950.
Watch for potential rotation in altcoins if BTC consolidates.

items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 05/10/2025 - Is it time for BTC rotation or one more dip to come?
bullets: BTC holding support at $25,000; resistance at $28,000.
Momentum shift observed with increased buying volume; watch for confirmation.

items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 04/10/2025 - Weekend Trap for Alts?
bullets: Key support level for alts at $1,200; potential resistance at $1,350.
Recent momentum shift observed with a break below $1,250, indicating bearish sentiment.
Invalidation point set at $1,400; watch for volume changes around this level.

items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 3/10/2025 - Should you be waiting for a pullback?
bullets: Price holding above $25,000 support level, indicating potential for upward momentum.
Resistance at $27,500; a break above could signal a bullish continuation.
Watch for a pullback to $24,500 as a potential entry point if momentum shifts.

items.title: Crypto Daily Update | 2/10/2025 - Pump, Pump & More Pump
bullets: BTC holds above $30,000 support, testing resistance at $32,000.
